Kenneth Nkosi (a mụrụ na 19 June 1973) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị.  O gosipụtara Aap na ihe nkiri afọ 2005 Tsotsi (2005).  Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri White Wedding (2009) na Otelo Burning (2011), yana Mad Buddies (2012) na Five Fingers for Marseilles (2017). Na Julaị 2011, ya na Rapulana Seiphemo, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Paradise Stop obere ihe nkiri na Rapulina Seiphemo.
